email.subject: Initiation
email.body:
Hello, #PLAYERNAME#.
Your skills have proven to be invaluable towards our efforts. We have contacted you in light that you will help our cause, and join Dominion.
If you wish to do so, we request you connect to the system linked below. This will lead to a set of trials that you must pass in order to be accepted into our group.
Otherwise, we have no use of you, you never heard from us.
-The Administration
